input.sentences: on his days off | [male] loves to hang out with the kids .
[male] has 4 kids and each one is very special to him .
his youngest daughter | [female] | loves to pose for pictures .
he is very happy that his children are so affectionate with each other .
whether they are being serious | or they act very silly | [male] is grateful for the time he gets to spend with the kids .
output.sentences: The love of a child is like no other.

Memories that will last a lifetime.
